Sentencas: In this study, an exergy analysis is applied to a conceptual integrated two-stage biomass gasifier and Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) system.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of an integrated two-stage biomass gasifier and Solid Oxide Fuel Cell system

Sentencas: Several simulations are conducted to assess the effect of some key input parameters on the exergy ratios of the components and the exergy efficiency of the system.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of an integrated two-stage biomass gasifier and Solid Oxide Fuel Cell system

Sentencas: The results show that the exergy efficiency of the integrated system varies between 11.6% and 40.4%.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of an integrated two-stage biomass gasifier and Solid Oxide Fuel Cell system

Sentencas: The highest exergy destructions occur at the two-stage gasifier and the heat exchanger supplying heat to the air entering the SOFC; whereas the dryer, the blower, and the SOFC have the lowest exergy destructions.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of an integrated two-stage biomass gasifier and Solid Oxide Fuel Cell system
